alert.note: Alert for Greene; Hawkins; Unicoi; Washington (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 12 at 12:51PM CST until January 12 at 1:30PM CST by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 230 PM EST FOR SOUTHEASTERN HAWKINS...WASHINGTON...GREENE AND UNICOI COUNTIES... At 151 PM EST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles south of Surgoinsville to near Greeneville to 8 miles south of Tusculum to near Hot Springs, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated and public damage reports. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Johnson City, Kingsport, Greeneville, Erwin, Rogersville, Jonesborough, Tusculum, Banner Hill, Midway and Gray. This includes the following highways... Interstate 26 in Tennessee between mile markers 12 and 23, and between mile markers 29 and 54. Interstate 81 in Tennessee between mile markers 27 and 53. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
